## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(dockViewR)

ui <- page_fillable(
  dock_viewOutput("dock")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$dock <- renderDock_view({
    dock_view("plop")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
